long_description: With a classic fit and modern print, the Neve Brodie Zip-Neck sweater is light in weight and perfect for layering over a button-up shirt or your favorite tee on a cool winter day. Made from 100% ultrafine merino wool that insulates and breathes well to keep you comfortable. Use the zip-neck to adjust the style and ventilation. Hand wash cold; lay flat to dry.
short_description: With a classic fit and modern print, the Neve Brodie Zip-Neck sweater is light in weight and perfect for layering over a button-up shirt or your favorite tee on a cool winter day.
